hay_fever: Inhaling pollen and other allergens such as dust, animal dander, or mold

spring: Go to your doctor and ask for the recommended seasonal allergy medication.
summer: Go to your doctor and ask for the recommended seasonal allergy medication.
Stay indoors to reduce pollen intake.
fall: Go to your doctor and ask for the recommended seasonal allergy medication.
Stay indoors to reduce pollen intake.
winter: Take proper seasonal allergy medication to reduce pollen allergies.
Clean your living area for dust mites.

hay_fever: Take proper medication for hay fever.
Use nasal spray to remove particles from your nose.
dust_mites: Keep your house temperature below 70 degrees fahrenheit and humidity lower than 70% to get rid of dust mites.
pets: Take standard allergy drugs such as anthustamines, decongestants, nasal steroids, and allergy shots.
